title: GIGIZAZA Gold Velvet Decorative Throw Pillow Covers,18x18 Pillow Covers for Couch Sofa Bed 2 Pack Soft Cushion Covers
descriptions:
Title: GIGIZAZA Gold Velvet Decorative Throw Pillow Covers, 18x18 Inch, 2-Pack – Soft Velvet Cushion Covers with Invisible Zipper for Couch, Sofa, Bed

Elevate your space with the rich sheen and plush feel of GIGIZAZA Gold Velvet Decorative Throw Pillow Covers. Crafted from 100% velvet, these 18x18 inch covers add instant warmth and elegance to your living room, bedroom, or office while delivering everyday comfort.

Key Features:
- Luxurious velvet: 100% velvet fabric with a soft, comfortable hand-feel and a subtle sheen that upgrades any decor.
- Perfect fit: Designed for 18 x 18 inch inserts; also compatible with 20 x 20 inch inserts for a fuller, plumper look.
- Invisible zipper: Discreet, smooth invisible zipper longer than 35 cm for easy insert placement and a clean, tailored finish.
- Versatile style: Ideal for sofa, couch, bed, chair, window seat, coffee shop, office, or car—mix and match effortlessly.
- Value 2-pack: Includes two matching gold pillow covers to refresh your space in seconds.

Details:
- Color: Gold
- Quantity: 2 pillow covers (inserts not included)
- Size: 18 x 18 inches / 45 x 45 cm
- Material: 100% velvet
- Closure: Invisible zipper (longer than 35 cm)

Care Instructions:
- Machine washable in cold water
- Tumble dry low
- For best results, turn inside out before washing and close the zipper

Customer Support:
We value your feedback. Contact us with suggestions or improvements—our team is here to help.
